newsletters.title: Promods 2.76
newsletters.description:
- Bulgaria: Благоевград (Blagoevgrad) (returned) - France: Free-flow tolls on A13 - Germany: BAB100 bridge removed, BAB9 improved - Gibraltar: Gibraltar - Latvia: Balvi (expanded) - Moldova: M5 & R30 Chișinău - Palanca added - Romania: DN10 Buzău - Brașov added - Serbia: Belgrade bypass - Turkey: Keşan (rebuilt) - Ukraine: Ізмаїл (Izmail), Одеса (Odesa), M15 added - Fuel stations updated in Estonia and Latvia - Added various ferries across the Black Sea - Special Transport routes fixes

Requires DLC :

EAST, NORTH, FRANCE, ITALY, BALTIC, BL_SEA, IBERIA, BALKAN, GREECE
newsletters.author: Sakthi
